configuration.name: Default XMLString XML Mapping test Configuration

XMLMapping.definition: <mapping> <class name="com.ail.core.document.generatedocument.StyleDocumentCommandImpl"> <field name="mergedDataArg" type="org.exolab.castor.types.AnyNode" handler="com.ail.core.xmlbinding.CastorXMLStringFieldHandler"> <bind-xml type="any" node="element"/> </field> <field name="styledDocumentRet" type="com.ail.core.XMLString"/> </class> </mapping>
